monumenta:challenges/r1/kaul/kaulsolo.description: Defeat Kaul Solo You are a true master of the jungle.

monumenta:challenges/r2/mist/find.description: You have discovered the Black Mist lobby. The crew is expecting you...

monumenta:dungeons/cyan/complete.title: Defeat Cyan Dungeon
monumenta:dungeons/cyan/complete.description: You fought off an ancient horror and claimed the Cyan Wool.

monumenta:dungeons/cyan/find.title: Found Cyan Dungeon
monumenta:dungeons/cyan/find.description: Deep below the ground lies an abandoned mineshaft, stained with secrets long forgotten. For what is a greater folly of man than the sin of greed? POI: Basanite Bore Coordinates: x=41 y=114 z=285

monumenta:dungeons/cyan/find_quest.description: In an attempt to uncover the secrets of Molta's past, you unintentionally opened a path to the surface for an evil that had been sealed away.

monumenta:dungeons/depths/complete.title: Defeat Darkest Depths
monumenta:dungeons/depths/complete.description: You fought back against Faimynyw's excursion into our world, and claimed powerful treasures.

monumenta:dungeons/depths/find.title: Found Darkest Depths
monumenta:dungeons/depths/find.description: Far, far below the waves lies a disturbance, a tear into our world. What possibly could have caused this? Location: Breachpoint Coordinates: x=-702 y=9 z=-186

monumenta:dungeons/forum/complete.title: Defeat The Fallen Forum
monumenta:dungeons/forum/complete.description: You delved into the ruined Congress and found the truth about what occurred there.

monumenta:dungeons/forum/find.title: Found The Fallen Forum
monumenta:dungeons/forum/find.description: Having passed through the time itself in the ruins of the Congress, the Fallen Forum awaits. Coordinates: x=-600 y=1 z=525

monumenta:dungeons/forum/find_quest.title: The Olive Branch
monumenta:dungeons/forum/find_quest.description: You found what the Teal Spirit was up to in the Ruins of the Congress, destroying a false wool to help free itself years ago. You destroyed the freed spirit, but Teal is still on the run.

monumenta:dungeons/forum/olive.title: Fallen Lore-um
monumenta:dungeons/forum/olive.description: You have scoured every corner of the Fallen Forum and collected yourself a Replica Olive Wool

monumenta:dungeons/fred/battle_tendency.title: Battle Tendency
monumenta:dungeons/fred/battle_tendency.description: You are a true master of the lore. Fred would be proud.

monumenta:dungeons/fred/complete.title: Defeat City of Shifting Waters
monumenta:dungeons/fred/complete.description: You explored the shifting depths of Steelmeld's undercity.

monumenta:dungeons/fred/find.title: Found City of Shifting Waters
monumenta:dungeons/fred/find.description: Deep below Steelmeld, sealed away by its unknown former inhabitants, lies secrets long since forgotten. POI: Steelmeld Passage Coordinates: x=-433 y=14 z=-495

monumenta:dungeons/fred/find_quest.title: Fred's Bizarre Adventure
monumenta:dungeons/fred/find_quest.description: You assisted Fred on his journey to unlock a strange passage way leading deep below Steelmeld.

monumenta:dungeons/fred/find_quest2.title: The Stone Ocean
monumenta:dungeons/fred/find_quest2.description: You assisted Fred with more research and ended up disturbing the city even further, bringing forth more dangerous rooms.

monumenta:dungeons/gray/cake.title: Cake?
monumenta:dungeons/gray/cake.description: You discovered the true treasure within the Valley of Forgotten Pharaohs.

monumenta:dungeons/gray/complete.title: Defeat Gray Dungeon
monumenta:dungeons/gray/complete.description: You excavated the lost city of Al Malakut and claimed the Gray Wool.

monumenta:dungeons/gray/find.title: Found Gray Dungeon
monumenta:dungeons/gray/find.description: What would force a kingdom to lock off their capital? Al Malakut awaits its rediscovery. POI: Lost Sands City Coordinates: x=239 y=66 z=394

monumenta:dungeons/gray/find_quest.title: The Gem of Ishnir
monumenta:dungeons/gray/find_quest.description: You discoved the tomb of Tehkma Ka and found the lost city of Al Malakut.

monumenta:dungeons/labs/complete.title: Defeat Alchemy Labs Dungeon
monumenta:dungeons/labs/complete.description: You removed the explosives, defeated the bandits, and came away a stronger warrior.

monumenta:dungeons/labs/find.title: Found Alchemy Labs Dungeon
monumenta:dungeons/labs/find.description: Ahead lies the Alchemy Labs, bandits, and their cache of explosives. City: Sierhaven Coordinates: x=-748 y=95 z=-87

monumenta:dungeons/labs/find_quest.title: Prologue : Alchemy Labs
monumenta:dungeons/labs/find_quest.description: You volunteered to take on bandits threatening to destroy the capital's Alchemy Labs.

monumenta:dungeons/light_blue/complete.title: Defeat Light Blue Dungeon
monumenta:dungeons/light_blue/complete.description: Neither the Mages above nor the Alchemists below held power over you, as you claimed the Light Blue Wool.

monumenta:dungeons/light_blue/find.title: Found Light Blue Dungeon
monumenta:dungeons/light_blue/find.description: There must be secrets hiding within this ancient place. POI: Creeper Farm Coordinates: x=797 y=174 z=-317

monumenta:dungeons/light_blue/find_quest.title: Scars of Magic
monumenta:dungeons/light_blue/find_quest.description: In your continued search for Ignos, you stumbled upon a secret of the Axtans that was best lost to time.

monumenta:dungeons/light_gray/complete.title: Defeat Light Gray Dungeon
monumenta:dungeons/light_gray/complete.description: You ventured deep inside the Palace of Mirrors and saw what no others could: the Light Gray Wool.

monumenta:dungeons/light_gray/find.title: Found Light Gray Dungeon
monumenta:dungeons/light_gray/find.description: Hidden within a citadel; hidden within a mirror. Alutana's palace stands strong. POI: Whitecliffe Citadel Coordinates: x=-1605 y=129 z=3

monumenta:dungeons/light_gray/find_quest.title: Mirrored Egos
monumenta:dungeons/light_gray/find_quest.description: Resolving the battle of light and darkness, now only their eclipse stands in your way.

monumenta:dungeons/lime/complete.title: Defeat Lime Dungeon
monumenta:dungeons/lime/complete.description: You ventured through the lost empire of Viridia and claimed the Lime Wool.

monumenta:dungeons/lime/find.title: Found Lime Dungeon
monumenta:dungeons/lime/find.description: Before you stands an empire lost to time, independent of Ishnir and Chillwind. What secrets from the distant past lie within? POI: Bastion at Sea Coordinates: x=-551 y=40 z=703

monumenta:dungeons/lime/find_quest.title: The Lost Empire
monumenta:dungeons/lime/find_quest.description: You had an unexpected run-in with Xeno and discoved the lost empire of Viridia.

monumenta:dungeons/magenta/complete.title: Defeat Magenta Dungeon
monumenta:dungeons/magenta/complete.description: You found what the ancient temple was defending - the Magenta Wool.

monumenta:dungeons/magenta/find.title: Found Magenta Dungeon
monumenta:dungeons/magenta/find.description: From the depths, you can feel a sickness pouring. What lies below? POI: Grand Maw Coordinates: x=350 y=71 z=82

monumenta:dungeons/magenta/find_quest.title: Roots of the Plague
monumenta:dungeons/magenta/find_quest.description: You restored the power of the Grand Maw and found a way inside a dungeon.

monumenta:dungeons/orange/complete.title: Defeat Orange Dungeon
monumenta:dungeons/orange/complete.description: You claimed the Orange Wool, overcoming the experimented beastmen within the Menagerie.

monumenta:dungeons/orange/find.title: Found Orange Dungeon
monumenta:dungeons/orange/find.description: You discovered a lost outpost of the Tlaxans, hiding more than just loot... POI: Abandoned Tunnels Coordinates: x=109 y=79 z=143

monumenta:dungeons/orange/find_quest.title: Beasts of Men
monumenta:dungeons/orange/find_quest.description: You made your way through C'Zanil's crypt and found a way inside a dungeon.

monumenta:dungeons/pink/complete.title: Defeat Pink Dungeon
monumenta:dungeons/pink/complete.description: You journeyed through a twisted world of demons and claimed the Pink Wool.

monumenta:dungeons/pink/find.title: Found Pink Dungeon
monumenta:dungeons/pink/find.description: Seasons bend and twist rapidly here. Deep in this dungeon lies a dark secret, do you dare seek it out? POI: Sealed Descent Coordinates: x=-1098 y=116 z=680

monumenta:dungeons/pink/find_quest.title: Harmonic Convergence
monumenta:dungeons/pink/find_quest.description: You attuned yourself to the four seasonal shrines and discovered the Harmonic Arboretum.

monumenta:dungeons/pink/rootstrike.title: Created Rootstrike
monumenta:dungeons/pink/rootstrike.description: You created Rootstrike, the sword of nobles.

monumenta:dungeons/purple/complete.title: Defeat Purple Dungeon
monumenta:dungeons/purple/complete.description: Below Corsair's Claw, you learned the truth about the final voyage of the Pirate King Varcosa.

monumenta:dungeons/purple/find.title: Found Purple Dungeon
monumenta:dungeons/purple/find.description: Below the mythical island of Corsair's Claw, the legendary pirate Varcosa awaits you. POI: Corsair's Claw Coordinates: x=551 y=81 z=1405

monumenta:dungeons/purple/find_quest.title: Rapacity
monumenta:dungeons/purple/find_quest.description: Seeking out the final fate of Salazar the Great, you discovered the mythical island of Corsair's Claw.

monumenta:dungeons/r1bonus/complete.title: Defeat The Black Willows
monumenta:dungeons/r1bonus/complete.description: The Willows, once guarded by a mysterious barrier, now lie defeated before you.

monumenta:dungeons/r1bonus/find.title: Found The Black Willows
monumenta:dungeons/r1bonus/find.description: A lost grove stretches before you, filled with riches. POI: Cave of Secrets Coordinates: x=458 y=74 z=-103

monumenta:dungeons/r1bonus/find_quest.title: The Staff
monumenta:dungeons/r1bonus/find_quest.description: Following a note, you took a staff to four shrines and found a new dungeon.

monumenta:dungeons/r1bonus/find_quest2.title: The Staff?
monumenta:dungeons/r1bonus/find_quest2.description: Following a new trail, you took the elemental staff to four amplified shrines and found a Delve.

monumenta:dungeons/reverie/complete.title: Defeat Malevolent Reverie
monumenta:dungeons/reverie/complete.description: You defeated Kaul, saved the Narsens, and left victorious.

monumenta:dungeons/reverie/find.title: Found Malevolent Reverie
monumenta:dungeons/reverie/find.description: One man's dream is the Narsens' nightmare. POI: Verdant Fortress? Coordinates: x=916 y=106 z=182

monumenta:dungeons/reverie/find_quest2.title: Crystal Visions
monumenta:dungeons/reverie/find_quest2.description: With the help of former Shaman Nai, you re-entered the dream and learned more about the nature of the Genius Loci- and angered Kaul yet again.

monumenta:dungeons/roguelike/complete.title: Defeat Normal Ephemeral Corridors
monumenta:dungeons/roguelike/complete.description: You discovered one of the many treasures of the Ephemeral Corridors, and many more remain hidden in its depths.

monumenta:dungeons/roguelike/completecla.title: Defeat Classic Ephemeral Corridors
monumenta:dungeons/roguelike/completecla.description: You discovered yet another of the many treasures of the Ephemeral Corridors, but could more remain hidden in its depths still?

monumenta:dungeons/roguelike/completehar.title: Defeat Hardcore Ephemeral Corridors
monumenta:dungeons/roguelike/completehar.description: You discovered another one of the many treasures of the Ephemeral Corridors, but still more remain hidden in its depths.

monumenta:dungeons/roguelike/find.title: Found Ephemeral Corridors Dungeon
monumenta:dungeons/roguelike/find.description: You find a maze of twisty little passages, all alike. POI: Anthill Coordinates: x=819 y=110 z=209

monumenta:dungeons/sanctum/find_quest.title: Shurima's Big Day Off
monumenta:dungeons/sanctum/find_quest.description: What started as a silly request for chores soon led you down a path to the Forsworn Sanctum.

monumenta:dungeons/teal/complete.title: Defeat Echoes of Oblivion
monumenta:dungeons/teal/complete.description: After defying the laws of time itself, you witnessed a Wool disappear from this world.

monumenta:dungeons/teal/find.title: Found Echoes of Oblivion
monumenta:dungeons/teal/find.description: Having passed through the Sacrarium of Aeons, a strange place lost to time now sits before you. POI: Sacrarium of Aeons Coordinates: x=-860 y=32 z=-450

monumenta:dungeons/teal/find_quest.title: Unmasked
monumenta:dungeons/teal/find_quest.description: After traveling through the lost empire of Isharist, the man you traveled with, Max, held a dark secret.

monumenta:dungeons/teal/hour.title: Man of the Hour
monumenta:dungeons/teal/hour.description: You collected all Time Crystals without falling into the void once. Wonderful job!

monumenta:dungeons/white/complete.title: Defeat White Dungeon
monumenta:dungeons/white/complete.description: You defeated the guardians of Quetzalcoatl, claiming the White Wool.

monumenta:dungeons/white/find.title: Found White Dungeon
monumenta:dungeons/white/find.description: Before you lies the ancient sacrificial temple to a lost god... POI: Tlaxan Ziggurat Coordinates: x=215 y=125 z=-109

monumenta:dungeons/white/find_quest.title: Winds of War
monumenta:dungeons/white/find_quest.description: You broke a powerful curse over the Blackroot Battlefield and found a way inside a dungeon.

monumenta:dungeons/yellow/complete.title: Defeat Yellow Dungeon
monumenta:dungeons/yellow/complete.description: The seasons overcome, now Kaul's power is released, but the Yellow Wool is now yours.

monumenta:dungeons/yellow/find.title: Found Yellow Dungeon
monumenta:dungeons/yellow/find.description: The seasons rage before you, a curse on the Sons of the Forest. Can you overcome them? POI: Cursed Forest Coordinates: x=1100 y=104 z=60

monumenta:dungeons/yellow/find_quest.title: Soul of the Forest
monumenta:dungeons/yellow/find_quest.description: You reclaimed the ancient relic from the Sons of the Forest and have given Highwatch an opportunity to attack Verdant Fortress.

monumenta:general/jackpot1.title: Royal Jackpot!
monumenta:general/jackpot1.description: Win the King's Warden in Rock's Little Casino.

monumenta:general/jackpot2.title: Tropical Jackpot!
monumenta:general/jackpot2.description: Win the Frost Giant's Crown in Monarch's Cozy Casino.

monumenta:general/r2transmog1.title: Tropical Transmog I
monumenta:general/r2transmog1.description: Use the Celsian Isles Transmogrifier 20 times.

monumenta:general/r2transmog2.title: Tropical Transmog II
monumenta:general/r2transmog2.description: Use the Celsian Isles Transmogrifier 50 times.

monumenta:general/r2transmog3.title: Tropical Transmog III
monumenta:general/r2transmog3.description: Use the Celsian Isles Transmogrifier 100 times.

monumenta:general/r2transmog4.title: Tropical Transmog IV
monumenta:general/r2transmog4.description: Use the Celsian Isles Transmogrifier 200 times.

monumenta:general/r2transmog5.title: Tropical Transmog V
monumenta:general/r2transmog5.description: Use the Celsian Isles Transmogrifier 500 times.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/abyssal.title: Abyssal
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/abyssal.description: While equipped, you deal an additional (level * 10)% damage if either you or the enemy you are damaging is in water.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/adaptabi.title: Adaptability
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/adaptabi.description: Allows secondary enchants (ex: Shielding, Reflexes, etc.) to all work with the defense type (Armor or Agility) you have the most of.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/adrenali.title: Adrenaline
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/adrenali.description: Upon attacking an enemy, you gain (level * 10)% speed for 3 seconds. Upon breaking a spawner with a pickaxe, you gain (level * 5)% speed for 6 seconds.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/agility.title: Agility
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/agility.description: One of Monumenta's primary defensive stats, along with Armor.Multiplies received damage taken by 0.96^Agility.If Armor and Agility are mixed, damage is multiplied by 0.96^(Armor + Agility - 0.5 * Armor * Agility / (Armor + Agility))

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/anemia.title: Curse of Anemia
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/anemia.description: Reduces amount of healing received by (level * 10)%.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/aptitude.title: Aptitude
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/aptitude.description: Decreases the cooldown of all of your skills by 5% per level multiplicatively.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/aquaaffi.title: Aqua Affinity
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/aquaaffi.description: Allows you to mine blocks underwater as if you were on land.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/ardor.title: Ardor
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/ardor.description: Mining a spawner outside of water grants you (level * 3.75)% speed for 4s. Mining a spawner underwater refreshes (level * 0.5) breath.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/armor.title: Armor
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/armor.description: One of Monumenta's primary defensive stats, along with Agility.Multiplies received damage taken by 0.96^Armor.If Armor and Agility are mixed, damage is multiplied by 0.96^(Armor + Agility - 0.5 * Armor * Agility / (Armor + Agility))

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/ashesofe.title: Ashes of Eternity
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/ashesofe.description: Applies the effects of Resurrection and Void Tether upon death while holding this item. This removes the enchant from the item. If the item has the enchant by default, it will be restored after every weekly update.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/aura.title: Aura
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/aura.description: Mobs in a 2 block radius from you are slowed by (level * 2)% for 0.5 seconds. This is refreshed as long as they are in range.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/barking.title: Barking
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/barking.description: Magically regrows the bark onto the logs you chop up.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/binding.title: Curse of Binding
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/binding.description: When worn, an item with Curse of Binding cannot be removed unless it breaks or the player dies.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/blastpro.title: Blast Protection
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/blastpro.description: Multiplies blast damage taken by (0.96) ^ (2 * level).

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/bleeding.title: Bleeding
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/bleeding.description: Applies Bleed (Enchantment level) for 5 seconds to all mobs struck by the Bleeding weapon. Bleed is a custom effect that applies (level * 10)% Slowness and Weakness to mobs under 50% Max Health.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/carapace.title: Carapace
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/carapace.description: After being hit, gain (level * 1.25)% damage reduction for 5 seconds, refreshed on being hit.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/chaotic.title: Chaotic
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/chaotic.description: Your weapon deals anywhere between +Level and -Level damage, in integer increments. This effect is halved for sweep attacks. This only works in your main hand.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/choler.title: Choler
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/choler.description: Deal (level * 1)% additional damage to any mob that is on fire, slowed, or stunned.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/colossal.title: Colossal
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/colossal.description: Items reinforced with Colossal don't take durability damage 50% of the time. Works with the Unbreaking enchant.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/consumab.title: Consumables
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/consumab.description: Enchantments that function on consumable items.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/corrupti.title: Curse of Corruption
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/corrupti.description: Holding or equipping one item is fine, but too much corruption is bad for you...

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/cosmetic.title: Cosmetic
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/cosmetic.description: Enchantments that grant a cosmetic effect to your items.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/cripplin.title: Curse of Crippling
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/cripplin.description: When under 50% health, your damage and movement speed is reduced by 10% per level.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/curses.title: Curses
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/curses.description: Curses that cause negative effects. Be careful!

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/darksigh.title: Darksight
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/darksigh.description: Gives night vision when held or worn.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/debarkin.title: Debarking
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/debarkin.description: Strips the bark off the logs you chop down.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/decay.title: Decay
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/decay.description: Applies a Decay effect that deals 1 damage every (40 / level) ticks for 4 seconds.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/defenses.title: Defenses
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/defenses.description: Enchantments that reduce the damage you take in some way or another.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/delve_in.title: Delve Infusions
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/delve_in.description: From the Depths and the Delves, offering special enchantments that can be specially added to your gear!

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/depthstr.title: Depth Strider
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/depthstr.description: Allows you to move faster by (level * 33)% when in water.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/divineau.title: Divine Aura
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/divineau.description: While equipped or stored in inventory, the player and mobs hit gain an aura of divine particles.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/efficien.title: Efficiency
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/efficien.description: Increases the speed at which you break blocks with the enchanted item. If on an Axe, it also increases the chance of stunning a shield by an additional 5% per level.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/empowere.title: Empowered
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/empowere.description: When you gain XP, you have a 0.25% chance per XP point per level to repair all currently equipped items by 1% of their max durability. There is also a slight prioritization to more damaged items.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/ephemera.title: Curse of Ephemerality
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/ephemera.description: All good things must come to an end. Will vanish when you log out, transfer shards, drop it, or try to move them to another inventory.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/epoch.title: Epoch
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/epoch.description: Class abilities cooldowns are reduced by (level * 1)%.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/eruption.title: Eruption
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/eruption.description: Deal (level * 4) damage in a 5 block radius that can apply the effects of Decay, Fire, Ice, and Thunder Aspect to nearby mobs, and Adrenaline, Sapper to nearby players, when a spawner is broken with the item. Thunder Aspect applied via Eruption stuns 100% of the time and adds (level * 0.5) seconds of stun.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/ethereal.title: Ethereal
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/ethereal.description: Gain (Level*20%) effective Agility on hits taken within 1.5 seconds of any previous hit.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/evasion.title: Evasion
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/evasion.description: Gain (Level*20%) effective Agility when taking damage from a source further than 5 blocks from the player.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/executio.title: Execution
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/executio.description: After killing an enemy, you deal (level * 1.5)% extra damage for 4 seconds.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/exorcism.title: Exorcism
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/exorcism.description: Deals 15 damage and applies Slowness III to mobs summoned within the Valley of Forgotten Pharaohs.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/expedite.title: Expedite
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/expedite.description: Damaging an enemy with an ability increases your movement speed by (level * 1)% for 5 seconds, stacking up to 3 times.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/featherf.title: Feather Falling
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/featherf.description: Multiplies fall damage taken by (0.88) ^ (3 * level).

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/festive.title: Festive
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/festive.description: While equipped or stored in inventory, gain an aura of festive particles that improve with every additional item.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/fireaspe.title: Fire Aspect
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/fireaspe.description: Ignites the target for (level * 4) seconds when dealing melee or projectile damage.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/fireprot.title: Fire Protection
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/fireprot.description: Multiplies fire damage taken by (0.96) ^ (2 * level). Reduces fire duration by 10% per level.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/fortune.title: Fortune
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/fortune.description: Increases the number of resources gained when breaking ores and certain other blocks that drop resources, based on level.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/gilded.title: Gilded
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/gilded.description: While your item is with you, you gain an aura of gold particles. While dropped, your item gains similar particles. Additional items increase your particles, capped at 10.A reward for winning the voting raffle.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/gills.title: Gills
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/gills.description: While equipped or held, gain Water Breathing.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/hexeater.title: Hex Eater
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/hexeater.description: Adds (level * 0.5) extra damage per debuff on the target.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/hope.title: Hope
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/hope.description: While dropped, items with Hope are indestructable and take 15 minutes to despawn.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/iceaspec.title: Ice Aspect
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/iceaspec.description: Applies (level * 10)% Slowness for 4 seconds when dealing melee or projectile damage. Deals 1 extra damage to Blazes.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/ineptitu.title: Ineptitude
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/ineptitu.description: Increases the cooldown of all of your skills by 5% per level multiplicatively.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/inferno.title: Inferno
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/inferno.description: Deals an extra 1 damage per level to enemies that are on fire, and 0.5 damage per level to enemies that are not on fire.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/infinity.title: Infinity
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/infinity.description: Your item gains infinite power. Bows never consume their arrow, crossbows return their loaded arrow, potions never go empty, and food never runs out.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/infusion.title: Infusions
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/infusion.description: Enchantments that can be specially added to your gear, should you pay the costs!

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/instantd.title: Instant Drink
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/instantd.description: Right clicking a potion with this enchant will instantly apply its effects to the player using it.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/inure.title: Inure
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/inure.description: Gain (Level*20%) effective Armor when taking the same type of mob damage consecutively (Melee, Projectile, Blast, or Magic).

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/irrepara.title: Curse of Irreparability
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/irrepara.description: Some items are too fragile to be repaired...

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/junglesn.title: Jungle's Nourishment
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/junglesn.description: Fills the hunger bar when eaten. Heals 4 hearts and gives 20% resistance for 4 seconds. 25 second cooldown.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/knockbac.title: Knockback
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/knockbac.description: Adds (level * 3) blocks to your knockback on melee strikes.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/locked.title: Locked
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/locked.description: Prevents the item from being swapped by a lockbox.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/looting.title: Looting
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/looting.description: Increases common loot drops by (Enchantment level) chances.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/lure.title: Lure
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/lure.description: Decreases the time spent waiting for a fish to appear by (level * 5) seconds.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/magicpro.title: Magic Protection
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/magicpro.description: Multiplies magic damage taken by (0.96) ^ (2 * level).

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/material.title: Material
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/material.description: A special item, used to craft another item - often Patron related ones. Items with this enchant also can be used as crafting materials in regular vanilla Minecraft recipes.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/meleepro.title: Melee Protection
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/meleepro.description: Multiplies melee damage taken by (0.96) ^ (2 * level).

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/mending.title: Mending
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/mending.description: Items with Mending that are worn or held repair 2 durability per xp orb consumed, chosen at random among your items with Mending.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/mitosis.title: Mitosis
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/mitosis.description: Mining a spawner debuffs all enemy types that spawner could spawn in a 4 block radius with (level * 3.75)% Weaken for 2 seconds.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/multisho.title: Multishot
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/multisho.description: Crossbows enchanted with Multishot fire 3 projectiles at once in a spread pattern. Only one projectile is consumed and only one out of the 3 can be picked up off the ground.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/multitoo.title: Multitool
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/multitoo.description: Allows a tool to change shape when you right-click with it. Level I lets it to cycle between a shovel and an axe. Level II additionally lets it cycle to being a pickaxe.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/natant.title: Natant
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/natant.description: You move (level * 3)% faster when in water.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/passivee.title: Passives
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/passivee.description: Enchantments that grant a passive effect when used or worn.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/persiste.title: Persistence
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/persiste.description: You will not drop this item on death.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/phylacte.title: Phylactery
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/phylacte.description: Dying with an item infused with Phylactery saves (10% * level) of your experience points in your grave. This stacks additively with itself across all items equipped. Experience will only be saved if you died with more than 100 experience points. Additionally, keep potion effects upon dying for (10% * level) of the duration.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/piercing.title: Piercing
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/piercing.description: Arrows shot from a crossbow with Piercing can pass through up to the number of entities equal to the enchantment level.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/pointbla.title: Point Blank
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/pointbla.description: Projectiles deal an additional (level * 2) damage if the enemy is within 8 blocks.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/poise.title: Poise
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/poise.description: Gain (Level*20%) effective Armor when above 90% Max Health.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/projecti.title: Projectile Protection
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/projecti.description: Multiplies projectile damage taken by (0.96) ^ (2 * level).

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/protecti.title: Protection of the Depths
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/protecti.description: While held, grants 25% damage reduction in Celsian Isles areas, or 15% damage reduction in King's Valley areas.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/quake.title: Quake
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/quake.description: When your melee attack kills an enemy, all nearby enemies in a 3-block cube take (level * 10)% of the damage dealt. Your weapon's Fire/Ice/Thunder Aspect, Decay and/or Bleed also get applied.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/quick_ch.title: Quick Charge
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/quick_ch.description: Decreases the time it takes to load a crossbow by (level * 0.25) seconds.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/radiant.title: Radiant
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/radiant.description: While held in your main hand, gain Glowing and Night Vision for 30s. You must be the soulbound owner of your item for this to work.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/rageofth.title: Rage of the Keter
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/rageofth.description: Restores 6 hunger and 6 saturation when eaten. Gives the player +15% to all damage and +15% speed for 15 seconds. 25 second cooldown.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/ranged.title: Ranged
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/ranged.description: Enchantments that grant special ranged effects.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/recoil.title: Recoil
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/recoil.description: When fired, your crossbow knocks you back a short distance, increasing with level. Crouching while firing prevents the recoil, but places crossbows on cooldown for 0.5 seconds.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/reflecti.title: Reflection
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/reflecti.description: 1 second after taking magic or blast damage, deal (level * 6)% of the ability's damage to all mobs in a 4 block radius, bypassing I-frames.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/reflexes.title: Reflexes
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/reflexes.description: Gain (Level*20%) effective Agility when there are 4 or more enemies within 8 blocks.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/regenera.title: Regeneration
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/regenera.description: When equipped, regain 1 * sqrt(level) health every 3s overall, received in small increments 4 times per second.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/regicide.title: Regicide
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/regicide.description: While equipped, you deal an additional (level * 10)% damage to elite enemies and (level * 5)% damage to boss enemies.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/respirat.title: Respiration
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/respirat.description: Extends your breathing time underwater by (level * 15) seconds.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/resurrec.title: Resurrection
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/resurrec.description: When you are about to die, this item provides Absorption and Regeneration, destroying itself in the process.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/retrieva.title: Retrieval
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/retrieva.description: Arrows have a (level * 10)% chance to not be consumed.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/riptide.title: Riptide
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/riptide.description: A Trident with Riptide can only be thrown when in water. When this happens, you are launched with your Trident a distance based on your Riptide level.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/root.title: Custom Enchantments
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/root.description: Enchantments found while adventuring in Monumenta.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/sapper.title: Sapper
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/sapper.description: Restore (Enchantment Level) health by breaking a spawner.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/second_w.title: Second Wind
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/second_w.description: Damage from attacks applied to the lower half of your max health is multiplied by 0.9^(level). Attacks received while under this threshold get their damage reduced; attacks that bring you under this threshold have the portion of the damage that is applied past the threshold reduced.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/shieldin.title: Shielding
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/shieldin.description: Gain Level*20% effective Armor when taking damage from an enemy within 2.5 blocks. Taking damage that would stun a shield and activates Shielding disables Shielding for 5 seconds.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/shrapnel.title: Curse of Shrapnel
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/shrapnel.description: When used to break a spawner, take (level) damage. This damages armor and bypasses damage reductions.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/silktouc.title: Silk Touch
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/silktouc.description: Allows blocks to drop as themselves instead of their normal drop, when broken with an item with this enchantment.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/slayer.title: Slayer
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/slayer.description: Deals (level * 2) damage to everything unaffected by Smite or Duelist; Spiders, Silverfish, Bees, Cave Spiders, Creepers, Ghasts, Shulkers, Endermen, Blazes, Slimes, Magma Cubes, Wolves, Ravagers, Hoglins, and passive animal mobs.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/smite.title: Smite
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/smite.description: Adds (level * 2) extra damage to melee hits against Undead mobs.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/sniper.title: Sniper
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/sniper.description: Projectiles deal an additional (level * 2) damage if the enemy is further than 16 blocks.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/soulspee.title: Soul Speed
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/soulspee.description: When on soul sand or soul soil, your speed will increase by (level * 10.5)%.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/spell_po.title: Spell Power
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/spell_po.description: Increases the damage of spells (+20% Spell Power increases the damage of all spells by 20%, for example), and only works with Mage skills. Spell Power stacks with the Magic Damage attribute.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/starvati.title: Starvation
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/starvati.description: Depletes your saturation and current hunger points by (Enchantment level) upon consuming the item cursed with Starvation. It fully depletes saturation, then moves on to removing hunger points.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/stasis.title: Stasis
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/stasis.description: While Stasis is active, you are immovable, immune to all damage and effects, and cannot use any interactions or abilities.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/stat_tra.title: Stat Track
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/stat_tra.description: Designates that an item has had stat tracking added to it via a Patron. Stats are only tracked if used by the person who added it as long as they're still a patron. A variety of different stats can be tracked, such as Mobs Killed, Times Consumed, Boss Damage Dealt, and more! Consider becoming a patron if you aren't one already to gain access to this perk.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/steadfas.title: Steadfast
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/steadfas.description: Scaling with percent health missing, gain up to (Level*20%) effective Armor. (0.25% armor speed per 1% health lost, up to 20% armor)

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/stylish.title: Stylish
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/stylish.description: While your item is equipped, you gain an upper aura of black particles.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/sustenan.title: Sustenance
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/sustenan.description: Increases amount of healing received by (level * 10)%.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/sweeping.title: Sweeping Edge
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/sweeping.description: Increases sweep damage by (1 + Attack Damage * (level / (level + 1))).

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/tempo.title: Tempo
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/tempo.description: Gain (Level*20%) effective Agility on the first hit taken after 4 seconds of taking no damage. Half of the bonus is granted after 2 seconds of taking no damage.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/throwing.title: Throwing Knife
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/throwing.description: Right-clicking consumes the item, instantly launching an arrow that deals 7-9 damage and applies the respective effects if the arrow is tipped.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/thundera.title: Thunder Aspect
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/thundera.description: Has a (level * 10)% chance to stun a mob for 2 seconds (0.5 for Elites) when dealing melee damage, or for 0.5 seconds (0 for Elites) when dealing projectile damage. Deals 1 extra damage to Guardians and Iron Golems.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/tools.title: Tools and Utility
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/tools.description: Enchantments that grant a helpful effect to your tools and weapons.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/triage.title: Triage
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/triage.description: Increases the amount of healing you do to others by (level * 5)%.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/two_hand.title: Two Handed
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/two_hand.description: Some items simply cannot be used correctly if your hands are full... Reduces attack damage, attack speed, and spell power of the item, reduces player movement speed, and restricts the ability to throw/shoot projectiles if held while also having an offhand equipped. Two-handed swords count as holding two swords for sake of Rogue abilities.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/unbreaki.title: Unbreaking
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/unbreaki.description: Makes gear break (level + 1)x slower.Works the same on tools, weapons, and armor.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/understa.title: Understanding
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/understa.description: All other Delve Infusions you are currently benefitting from gain (level * .25) levels of this Infusion.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/unyieldi.title: Unyielding
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/unyieldi.description: Increases your Knockback Resistance by 0.4 per level.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/usurper.title: Usurper
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/usurper.description: Heal (level * 2.5)% of your max health whenever you slay an elite or boss enemy.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/vanishin.title: Curse of Vanishing
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/vanishin.description: When held in inventory, an item with Curse of Vanishing shatters upon death. Curse of Vanishing II will cause the item to be completed deleted upon death.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/voidteth.title: Void Tether
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/voidteth.description: If you die in the void, this item is consumed and a single block of obsidian is placed underneath you.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/weapons.title: Weapons
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/weapons.description: Enchantments that alter your attacks and increase the damage of them.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/weightle.title: Weightless
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/weightle.description: May be held in the offhand without incurring a debuff from the Two Handed curse.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ac.title: Narsen Academy
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ac.description: Here you may change your class and skills at any time. If you're looking for a quest, Sybil may be able to point you in the right direction.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ap.title: Apartments
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ap.description: For a small amount of XP, you can get three Ender Chest Expansions for all your storage needs. Also the home of the snowman embassy.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ca.title: Rock's Little Casino
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ca.description: Every Casino Chip grants a prize, some more fabulous than others - none moreso than the Epic King's Warden !

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ca.title: Castle Narsen
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ca.description: Here you can found or join a guild, purchase a plot, see all our patrons, get info about Team Monumenta, or meet the King of the Narsens.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ci.title: Dr Volkamph's Circus
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ci.description: Trade your Tier 1 through 5 for circus tickets! Save up for animal spawn eggs and the Epic King's Sabatons !

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ci.title: City Guide
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ci.description: She has maps and survival gear all for free in the Sierhaven plaza, with the P.E.B. Station and the Nexus entrance nearby.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/cr.title: Crafter
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/cr.description: Guarded by the Tlaxans, these devices allow crafting items that can't be obtained in any other way.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ct.title: C'Taz
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ct.description: A Tlaxan shaman, known for brewing elixirs and potions. Coordinates: x=240 y=78 z=303

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/fa.title: Farr
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/fa.description: A Narsen town built from ruins of Tlaxan architecture

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/he.title: King's Herald
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/he.description: Every day the Herald offers a bounty in a POI. Complete the bounty, then talk to the Herald for your reward. The harder the POI, the better the reward. There are two available bounties a day on weekends.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/hi.title: Highwatch
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/hi.description: A fortified keep protecting a mystical structure

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ho.title: Hot Springs
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ho.description: Give yourself a glowing aura, cleanse yourself and arrows of effects, or just relax and rejuvenate in the mystical Ta'Eldim hot springs.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/in.title: Infusion Altar
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/in.description: Hidden away in the city of Ta'Eldim, this sacred altar can make your equipment stronger.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/lo.title: Lowtide
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/lo.description: A quaint lakeside town beside a massive seagate

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/mo.title: The Monument of the Valley
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/mo.description: Five wools with magical properties must be found, one in each of the Region 1 Wool Dungeons. To reach Region 2, you need to Complete the Monument. Region 1 Wool Monument

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ny.title: Nyr
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ny.description: A small town overlooking a scorched battleground

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/oc.title: Oceangate
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/oc.description: A mighty bastion guarding the route from the Valley

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/pa.title: Shrine to the Benevolent
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/pa.description: Patrons can activate this shrine to grant buffs to the whole server. and can apply stat tracking to their items at the nearby Sierhaven Tracker. If you wish to change what messages the patron shrine sends you or toggle what effects you want to get, interact with it and select options. Region 1 Patreon Shrine

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ro.title: The King's Valley
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ro.description: A luxuriant landscape, scarred from a recent war.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/se.title: Seasonal Pass Hub
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/se.description: This room serves as the hub for the amazing Seasonal Pass events that are run regularly in Monumenta.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/si.title: Sierhaven
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/si.description: The shining capital of the King's Valley

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ta.title: Ta'Eldim
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ta.description: A hidden sanctuary of the Tlaxan people

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/te.title: The King's Station
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/te.description: Fast travel to towns, plots, dungeons and more! Region 1 Teleport Hub

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/tr.title: Transmogrifier
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/tr.description: The Transmogrifier can be used to recycle unwanted items into something more useful! - Transmogrifications require a Power Crystal or greater in order to use. - Four items of the same tier return a random item of the next tier up. - Four Tier V items give you Pulsating Dust . - Two Rare items give you a random Rare item.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/ac.title: The Teacher's Domain
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/ac.description: Here you can change your class and skills at any time. The Teacher may also help you unlock new abilities to empower your class.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/al.title: Alnera
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/al.description: The bustling capital of the Ishnir Empire

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/bl.title: King Barbossa's Black Market
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/bl.description: Find salvage traders from cities across the Isles selling Unique items thought lost. Region 2 Unique Buybacks

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/br.title: Breachpoint
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/br.description: An underwater outpost built to investigate the depths of the world

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/ca.title: The Floating Carnival
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/ca.description: Exchange your Tier 2 through Tier 4 items for Carnival Tokens to play minigames and win prizes!

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/ca.title: Monarch's Cozy Casino
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/ca.description: Every Casino Chip grants a prize, some more fabulous than others. Comfortably try your hand to get the Epic Frost Giant's Crown !

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/de.title: Delve Infusion Station
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/de.description: A curious machine that allows you to further enhance your equipment.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/do.title: Mistport Docks
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/do.description: A multitude of ships dock here, including a ship carrying a mystical Seer who can tell you your fate. The dock ships will depart and new ships will lay anchor over time.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/fr.title: Frostgate
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/fr.description: An oceanside citadel and capital of the Chillwind Empire

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/in.title: Infusion Altar
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/in.description: This invention of a long lost civilization will enable you to strengthen your equipment.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/mi.title: Mistport
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/mi.description: A small haven of piracy and lawlessness

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/mo.title: Molta
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/mo.description: A mining town amidst the ruins of other expeditions

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/mo.title: The Monument of the Isles
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/mo.description: As with before, six powerful Wool blocks must be placed atop this hallowed altar. Scour the dungeons of the Celsian Isles to Complete the Monument! Region 2 Wool Monument

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/ni.title: Nightroost
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/ni.description: A hilltop village ravaged by a threat still looming

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/pa.title: Pedestal o' Patrons
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/pa.description: Patrons can activate this shrine to grant buffs to the whole server. If you wish to change what messages the patron shrine sends you or toggle what effects you want to get, interact with it and select options. Region 2 Patreon Shrine

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/ra.title: Rahkeri
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/ra.description: A trade town now used as a vantage point for military operations

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/re.title: Ronevo's Repairs and Recycling
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/re.description: The dwelling of Repairman Ronevo. You can repair items here, as well as sell tiered items.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/ro.title: The Celsian Isles
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/ro.description: A large archipelago, split between frost and flame.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/se.title: Shipwreck Seeker
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/se.description: An avid diver who has built up a collection of relics. He's willing to trade them for Gleaming Seashells .

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/st.title: Steelmeld
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/st.description: An isolated underwater base built from an unknown time

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/te.title: Seascour Trading Hub
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/te.description: Fast travel to towns, plots, dungeons and more! Region 2 Teleport Hub

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/tr.title: Transmogrifier
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/tr.description: The Transmogrifier can be used to recycle unwanted items into something more useful! - Transmogrifications require a Magma Crystal or greater in order to use. - Four items of the same tier return a random item of the next tier up. - Four Tier V items give you Pulsating Powder . - Two Rare items give you a random Rare item.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/wi.title: Wispervale
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/wi.description: A town of magic in a culture where magic is shunned

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/root.title: Important Locations
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/root.description: Places you may want to revisit.

monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/ci/celsian.title: Celsian Isles Items
monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/ci/celsian.description: Items from Region 2, the Celsian Isles! - Use the same tiers as King's Valley items, but much stronger. - Wearing these in R1 makes you take 200% more damage and 10% slower. - Holding these in R1 gives you Mining Fatigue 1 and lowers your damage by 50%.

monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/1.title: King's Valley : Tier I
monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/1.description: You have to start somewhere. - Found in early POIs. - Can sell for money.

monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/2.title: King's Valley : Tier II
monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/2.description: Not bad. - Found in early POIs. - Can sell for money. - Can sell for a Circus Ticket.

monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/3.title: King's Valley : Tier III
monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/3.description: Getting better. - Found in most POIs. - Can sell for money. - Can sell for a Circus Ticket. - Can transmogrify four for a random Tier IV item.

monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/4.title: King's Valley : Tier IV
monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/4.description: Pretty good! - Found in late-game POIs. - Can sell for money. - Can sell for a Circus Ticket. - Can transmogrify four for a random Tier V item.

monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/5.title: King's Valley : Tier V
monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/5.description: The best of the common stuff! - Found rarely in the overworld, in dungeons, and in Bounties. - Can sell for money. - Can sell for 3 Circus Tickets. - Can transmogrify four for Pulsating Dust.

monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/artifac.title: King's Valley : Artifact
monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/artifac.description: A reward for conquering some of Monumenta's toughest content. - Can turn into Artifact Fragments.

monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/epic.title: King's Valley : Epic
monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/epic.description: The most powerful items in the King's Valley. - Obtained by various expensive means. - Can only be sold to players.

monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/legacy.title: King's Valley : Legacy
monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/legacy.description: Just because it's old doesn't mean it's good. - Used to be available, but is no longer supported. - Can only be obtained from players who still have them. - Can only be sold to players. - Generally have had all stats removed. - Very expensive to repair. - Cannot be reforged.

monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/patron.title: King's Valley : Patron Made
monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/patron.description: Designed by our Patrons , and useable by anyone! - Found and crafted in all sorts of ways. - Can only be sold to players.

monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/rare.title: King's Valley : Rare
monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/rare.description: These are really good for the area! - Specific to their dungeon, or King's Valley's overworld. - Can turn into Rare Fragments. - Can transmogrify 2 into a random Rare. - Some rares from dungeons can be enhanced!

monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/uncommo.title: King's Valley : Uncommon
monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/uncommo.description: Can only be reliably found in a few places. - Found in specific POIs and dungeons. - Can sell for money. - Can sell for a Circus Ticket. - Some uncommons from points of interest can be enhanced!

monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/unique.title: King's Valley : Unique
monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/unique.description: Usually better than other items nearby, but there's only one... right? - Quest reward. - Can only be sold to players. - For enough CXP and Pulsating Dust, a Shady Trader may be able to replace them.

monumenta:handbook/mobs/elites.title: Elite Mobs
monumenta:handbook/mobs/elites.description: Elites have gold names and tend to be more dangerous than normal mobs.

monumenta:handbook/mobs/player_death.title: So you've died...
monumenta:handbook/mobs/player_death.description: Happens to everyone. Your stuff won't despawn for 10 minutes or longer, so you can still recover it before then! Items that are destroyed or that despawn are placed in an unbreakable armor stand called a Grave near to where you died. A few tips: - Ask a player for help (some may help without being asked) - Keep backup gear in your plot/ender chest - Make sure you have the right gear

monumenta:handbook/mobs/root.title: Mobs and Combat
monumenta:handbook/mobs/root.description: Some tips on the combat mechanics of Monumenta.

monumenta:handbook/mobs/shattered.title: Shattered Items
monumenta:handbook/mobs/shattered.description: When items you dropped on death are destroyed and placed in a Grave, they are left in a shattered state. In order to become useable again, they must be repaired by a Repairman.

monumenta:handbook/money/ac.title: Adventurer's Crystal
monumenta:handbook/money/ac.description: Reward for conquering an amplified location. Used for trades with the Plot Assistant Coordinator.

monumenta:handbook/money/cchip.title: Crystalline Chip
monumenta:handbook/money/cchip.description: Casino currency. Can be converted to CCS and back freely.

monumenta:handbook/money/ccs.title: Compressed Crystalline Shard
monumenta:handbook/money/ccs.description: CCS; Used for more expensive trades. Can be converted to CS and back freely.

monumenta:handbook/money/chip.title: Chip
monumenta:handbook/money/chip.description: Casino currency. Can be converted to CXP and back freely.

monumenta:handbook/money/cs.title: Crystalline Shard
monumenta:handbook/money/cs.description: CS; The basic currency of the Celsian Isles.

monumenta:handbook/money/cxp.title: Concentrated Experience
monumenta:handbook/money/cxp.description: CXP; Used for more expensive trades. Can be converted to XP and back freely.

monumenta:handbook/money/gd.title: Gleaming Dust
monumenta:handbook/money/gd.description: Special currency given for breaking down Region 2 rare items into their base form in Dungeon Lobbies.

monumenta:handbook/money/gs.title: Gleaming Seashell
monumenta:handbook/money/gs.description: GS; Reward for a Celsian Bounty. Some items can only be purchased with these.

monumenta:handbook/money/hcs.title: Hyper Crystalline Shard
monumenta:handbook/money/hcs.description: HCS; Used for even more expensive trades. Can be converted to CCS and back freely.

monumenta:handbook/money/hxp.title: Hyper Experience
monumenta:handbook/money/hxp.description: HXP. Used for even more expensive trades. Can be converted to CXP and back freely.

monumenta:handbook/money/pd.title: Pulsating Dust
monumenta:handbook/money/pd.description: Special currency given for transmogrifying four Tier 5 items from region 1.

monumenta:handbook/money/pe.description: Special currency given for combining two Gleaming Dust from region 2 with Jean Bay at the Infusion Altar.

monumenta:handbook/money/pg.title: Pulsating Gold
monumenta:handbook/money/pg.description: Special currency given for combining two Royal Dust from region 1 with Keloch at the Infusion Altar.

monumenta:handbook/money/pp.title: Pulsating Powder
monumenta:handbook/money/pp.description: Special currency given for transmogrifying four Tier 5 items from region 2.

monumenta:handbook/money/rc.title: Royal Crystal
monumenta:handbook/money/rc.description: RC; Reward for the King's Bounty. Some items can only be purchased with these.

monumenta:handbook/money/rd.title: Royal Dust
monumenta:handbook/money/rd.description: Special currency given for breaking down Region 1 rare items into their base form in Dungeon Lobbies.

monumenta:handbook/money/root.title: Money
monumenta:handbook/money/root.description: It'll help you get the gear you want.

monumenta:handbook/money/scchip.title: Special Crystalline Chip
monumenta:handbook/money/scchip.description: Rigged casino currency. More likely to land a jackpot than a normal chip.

monumenta:handbook/money/xp.title: Experience
monumenta:handbook/money/xp.description: XP; The basic currency of King's Valley.
